channel.title: Safety on The Garden
channel.description: Recent content in Safety on The Garden

item.title: Online safety
item.description: This is how to take yours and others’ privacy/safety into account. Get a VPN to encrypt your browsing and data. I use Private Internet Access, it’s like $3/mo and covers all my devices Use Signal or other fully end to end encrypted calls, texts, and videos. Do not use regular SMS or phone calls, they can be tracked. FaceTime audio will do if no other option is available. Do not share whereabouts online, don’t send sensitive info via twitter and Instagram.
